meanings.definition: A person who raises or breeds poultry for meat or eggs.
meanings.sent1: The poultryman carefully tends to his chickens every morning.
meanings.sent2: The poultryman sells fresh eggs at the local market.
meanings.sent3: The poultryman joked that his chickens were the real bosses on the farm.
meanings.sent4: The poultryman's farm was a bustling city of clucks and feathers.
meanings.sent5: The poultryman's dedication to his flock was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A man who works in the poultry industry.
meanings.sent1: The poultryman at the processing plant ensures the chickens are handled humanely.
meanings.sent2: The poultryman inspects the quality of the eggs before packaging.
meanings.sent3: The poultryman laughed as he recounted the day a chicken chased him around the coop.
meanings.sent4: The poultryman's overalls were a badge of honor in the poultry world.
meanings.sent5: The poultryman's expertise in poultry was unmatched in the industry.
